bug.author: jamiebullock
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Problem location</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://mlpack.org/doc/mlpack-3.0.4/doxygen/nstutorial.html>https://mlpack.org/doc/mlpack-3.0.4/doxygen/nstutorial.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h4>Description of problem</denchmark-h>
It seems like math symbols are not being rendered on the website. So there are gaps in the text as shown below. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/579188/74101397-51700d00-4b31-11ea-8075-23a5af4a0cce.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for the report, will look into the issue.

Ha, I know why this happened. We switched from a white-on-black to black-on-white website, but the scripts still invert the Doxygen images. Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack.org/compare/f054f4fc8486abe5a096649ad76aae121d51dcc0...3e86fe4fbf403d4a79f6b86eb80c01d8538d4164>mlpack/mlpack.org@f054f4f...3e86fe4</denchmark-link> and I redeployed the site. Thanks for pointing it out!
